name: speculative-loading-admin
description: Adds speculative loading to the WP Admin for prerendering links with moderate eagerness in the Admin Bar and Admin Menu. Experimental.
author: Weston Ruter

scripts.format: wp-scripts format --ignore-path=.gitignore && npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:css:fix && composer phpcbf && composer normalize
scripts.lint: tsc && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && composer phpstan && npm run lint:php && npm run lint:composer && npm run lint:pkg-json && npm run transform-readme
scripts.plugin-zip: npm run transform-readme && git archive --format=zip --output=speculative-loading-admin.zip --add-file readme.txt HEAD && zip speculative-loading-admin.zip -d README.md
